name: READ
description: Access data records from the database.

name: WRITE
description: Create new data records and save them to the database.

name: UPDATE
description: Update data records already saved in the database.

name: DELETE
description: Delete a data record from the database.

name: CREATE_USER
description: Add new users to the database.

name: DELETE_USER
description: Delete a user from the database.

name: VIEW_USER
description: View all users in the database.
